title: Mounting my Electric Hummer Motor - WITH LASERS!
description: Its time to mount the Electric Motor inside my Military Humvee. HUGE thanks to OshCut for laser cutting my motor mounts:  If you want your own laser cut Unofficial Model of a CyberTruck The FREE download can be found HERE:  Then drag and drop the .dxf files onto OshCuts website here:  make sure you select the right gauge of stainless steel (its in the file name).
